queryMap.query: SELECT /* rbr1040_s01 */ '0' AS CHK ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBRK_SPEC_CD B WHERE B.GRP_CD ='018' AND B.CD = BRNC_CD AND A.CON_CD = 001) BRNCD_CD ,(SELECT B.CON_STR_DT FROM (SELECT A.CON_STR_DT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.CON_STR_DT ASC) AS n FROM TBRT_CON_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BRNC_CD = 13 ) B WHERE n = 1) CON_STR_DT ,(SELECT B.CON_END_DT FROM (SELECT A.CON_END_DT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.CON_STR_DT DESC) AS n FROM TBRT_CON_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BRNC_CD = 13 ) B WHERE n = 1) CON_END_DT ,(SELECT NVL(SUM(A.CON_MONEY),0) FROM TBRT_CON_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BRNC_CD = 13) CON_MONEY ,A.CON_COMPANY ,A.CON_RMK FROM TBRT_CON_INFO A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BRNC_CD = 13 AND A.STND_YEAR = 2011 AND A.CON_CD = 001

SELECT /* rbr1040_s02 */ '0' AS CHK ,A.STND_YEAR --년도 ,A.BRNC_CD ,A.SEQ ,A.CON_CD ,A.CON_MONEY ,A.CON_COMPANY --지점코드 ,A.CON_RMK ,A.CON_STR_DT ,A.CON_END_DT ,A.INST_ID --작성자 ,A.INST_DT --작성일시 ,A.UPDT_ID --수정자 ,A.UPDT_DT --수정일시 FROM TBRT_CON_INFO A --시설현황 WHERE 1=1 AND A.STND_YEAR = ? --년도 ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR,A.BRNC_CD,A.SEQ

SELECT /* rbr1040_s03 */ '0' AS CHK ,A.STND_YEAR --년도 ,A.BRNC_CD ,A.SEQ ,A.CON_CD ,A.CON_MONEY ,A.CON_COMPANY --지점코드 ,A.CON_RMK ,A.CON_STR_DT ,A.CON_END_DT ,A.INST_ID --작성자 ,A.INST_DT --작성일시 ,A.UPDT_ID --수정자 ,A.UPDT_DT --수정일시 FROM TBRT_CON_INFO A --시설현황 WHERE 1=1 AND A.STND_YEAR = ? --년도 ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR,A.BRNC_CD,A.SEQ

SELECT /* rbr1040_s04 */ '0' AS CHK ,A.STND_YEAR --년도 ,A.SEQ ,A.EQUIP_GBN ,A.EQUIP_CD ,A.BRNC_CD --지점코드 ,A.BUY_RMK ,A.CON_MONEY ,A.INST_ID --작성자 ,A.INST_DT --작성일시 ,A.UPDT_ID --수정자 ,A.UPDT_DT --수정일시 FROM TBRT_CON_EQUIP A --시설현황 WHERE 1=1 AND A.STND_YEAR = ? --년도 AND A.EQUIP_GBN = '152' ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR,A.SEQ,A.EQUIP_CD

SELECT /* rbr1040_s05 */ '0' AS CHK ,A.STND_YEAR --년도 ,A.SEQ ,A.EQUIP_GBN ,A.EQUIP_CD ,A.BRNC_CD --지점코드 ,A.BUY_RMK ,A.CON_MONEY ,A.INST_ID --작성자 ,A.INST_DT --작성일시 ,A.UPDT_ID --수정자 ,A.UPDT_DT --수정일시 FROM TBRT_CON_EQUIP A --시설현황 WHERE 1=1 AND A.STND_YEAR = ? --년도 AND A.EQUIP_GBN = '153' ORDER BY A.STND_YEAR,A.SEQ,A.EQUIP_CD
